segments.text: Look , daddy is on again . Don't you think he is handsome ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To some extent , he is . And what do you think we move to a better place ? I can't see him clearly from here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The seats in the middle of this stadium are great , but they're already occupied by somebody else .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , thank you for pointing that out . By the way , have you been following NBA for this season ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , tomorrow evening there will be a most exciting game .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Rockets vs Lakers . Yao Ming , my idol , will appear in front of several hundred million of the worldwide audience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's amazing . And when did he begin to play in the NBA ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In 2002 . And since then he has attracted more attention than ever .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't consider you as a little kid any more . I know he is very tall .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you know something . He is 2.26 meters tall . But he is also nimble and skillful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I also heard if a player has committed 5 fouls then he must be out of the game .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , what's worse is he can't take any further part in the game .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's really terrible . Oh , God , we forgot to cheer for Daddy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Never mind . After all he is not so attractive as Yao Ming , right ?
segments.speaker: S1
